mean_cn: adj. 不可抵抗的，不能压制的，极为诱人的
mean_en: impossible to resist especially because of strength or attractiveness
word_etyma: ir不，无+resist抵抗+ible形容词后缀，能…的→irresistible不可抗拒的
short_phrase: Smoking is irresistible if you're addicted.
sentence: These cakes and pastries are irresistible. Give me more!
sentence_trans: 这些蛋糕和甜点太诱人了，我还要！
